Headline: #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express Temporary Reroute near Sheridan/Rogers
ShortDescription: 147 Outer DuSable LS Exp. buses temp. rerouted NB: Sheridan, Rogers, Howard Terminal; SB: Howard, Rogers, Sheridan; due to street blockage near Sheridan/Rogers.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Sheridan/Rogers, due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via Sheridan, Rogers & Howard Terminal.

Southbound buses will operate via Howard, Rogers & Sheridan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Montrose
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Montrose due to a door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Montrose due to a door problem. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
